00039 #ifndef RANDOMDEVIATE_H_
00040 #define RANDOMDEVIATE_H_
00041 
00042 class RandomDeviate
00043 {
00044 public:
00045         explicit RandomDeviate( const unsigned long arraySize = 1000000 );
00046     virtual ~RandomDeviate( );
00047     virtual void FillArray( double* array, const unsigned long arraySize )=0;
00048     unsigned long NumbersGenerated( ) const;
00049     unsigned long NumbersProvided( ) const;
00050     double RandomDouble( );
00051   
00052 private:
00053      const unsigned long m_arraySize;
00054      double* m_randomNumber;
00055      unsigned long m_numbersGenerated;
00056      unsigned long m_nextRandomNumber;
00057 };     
00058 
00059 inline RandomDeviate::RandomDeviate( const unsigned long arraySize )
00060 : m_arraySize(arraySize), m_randomNumber(0), m_numbersGenerated(0), m_nextRandomNumber(arraySize)
00061 {
00062         m_randomNumber = new double[arraySize];
00063 }
00064 
00065 inline RandomDeviate::~RandomDeviate( )
00066 {
00067         if( m_randomNumber ) delete [] m_randomNumber;
00068 }
00069 
00070 inline double RandomDeviate::RandomDouble( )
00071 {
00072         if( m_nextRandomNumber >= m_arraySize  )
00073         {
00074                 m_nextRandomNumber = 0;
00075                 FillArray( m_randomNumber, m_arraySize );
00076                 m_numbersGenerated += m_arraySize;
00077         }
00078         return m_randomNumber[m_nextRandomNumber++];
00079 }
00080 
00081 inline unsigned long RandomDeviate::NumbersGenerated( ) const
00082 {
00083         return m_numbersGenerated;
00084 }
00085 
00086 inline unsigned long RandomDeviate::NumbersProvided( ) const
00087 {
00088         return ( m_numbersGenerated > 0 )? m_numbersGenerated - m_arraySize + m_nextRandomNumber : 0;
00089 }
00090 
00091 #endif // RANDOMDEVIATE_H_
